reviewText: I teach two-handed casting. This is the DVD I recomend my class to purchase. Easy to understand and has lots of useful tips.
Very satisfied, and everything I was looking for was here is this Spey Casting Video.
Fantastic video ... everything you ever wanted to know about Spey casting and somme good lessons on single hand ed casting also

Simple to understand, I watch it then go out and try what they say. I must have watch this DVD 50 times. No kidding but this winter I caught my first Steelhead on a Spey Rod. This is the best teaching DVD I have in my collection.

A buddy of mine lent this video to me and I managed to watch it twice before he took it back.  It had to be in my library and so I picked it up.  The casting segment videos are well produced and do an excellent job of illustrating the fly casting technique they are teaching.  This video is recommended for competent fly casters ready to take the next step.
